lead_paragraph: With India's real estate market mired in debt, developers seek to offload billions of dollars worth of unfinished homes with increasing intensity.

headline.main: Struggling Mumbai Developers Turn to Gimmicks
headline.print_headline: Struggling Mumbai Developers Turn to Gimmicks

snippet: With India's real estate market mired in debt, developers seek to offload billions of dollars worth of unfinished homes with increasing intensity.
